biotools.summary: An online tool for diagnosis and gene discovery in rare disease research. The platform features allow identifying disease-causing mutations in rare disease patients and linking them with detailed clinical information.

bioschemas.name: RD-Connect Genome-Phenome Analysis Platform (GPAP)
bioschemas.summary: An online tool for diagnosis and gene discovery in rare disease research. The platform features allow identifying disease-causing mutations in rare disease patients and linking them with detailed clinical information.
